title: Manage storage classes
pageDescription: The Kubernetes cluster has several pre-configured storage classes integrated with VK Cloud based on the Cinder CSI interface. Learn how to manage these classes and create new ones based on them.
shortDescription: How to manage existing storage classes and create new ones
metaTitle: Manage Storage Classes - VK Cloud Solutions
markdown: Kubernetes cluster has several pre-configured storage classes integrated with VK Cloud based on the Cinder CSI interface. Learn how to manage these classes and create new ones based on them.
